attributes.action: Not go to war with Russia and stop supplying the Ukraine with arms
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to withdraw immediately the arm supply to the Ukraine unless they are legally purchasing from British companies.
I want Parliament to block any use of our armed forces to support the Ukraine this is not our war or our business.
This country is not to be used by the USA or any other country we are not the UN that is their job which the Ukraine is not a member of.
This is a dirty political war and we are not involved!
attributes.background:
The Government need to hold a public vote on the war between Russia and the Ukraine. 
We the public do not want to go into another war which has nothing to do with this country.
Tony Blair entered into an illegal war and look how we have suffered!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Referendum on whether the UK should be neutral in the Ukraine/Russia conflict: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617939

End military aid to Ukraine to avoid the risk of nuclear war with Russia: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/615481
